Protocols.html#/s:6Nimbus10ConnectionP.name: Connection
Protocols.html#/s:6Nimbus10ConnectionP.abstract: A Connection links native function to a javascript execution environment.

Protocols/EventKeyPathing.html.name: EventKeyPathing
Protocols/EventKeyPathing.html.abstract: Conformers to this protocol provide a mapping from a key path to a string

Protocols/JSEvaluating.html.name: JSEvaluating
Protocols/JSEvaluating.html.abstract: A type that conforms to JSEvaluating can call JavaScript functions

Protocols/Plugin.html.name: Plugin
Protocols/Plugin.html.abstract: A plugin integrates native capabilities into a JavaScript runtime environment.

Extensions/WKWebView.html#/s:So9WKWebVie.name: broadcastMessage(name:arg:completionHandler:)

Classes/WebViewConnection.html#/s:6Nimbu.name: init(from:bridge:as:)
Classes/WebViewConnection.html#/s:6Nimbu.abstract: Create a connection from the web view to an object.

Classes/WebViewConnection.html#/s:6Nimbu.name: call(_:args:promise:)
Classes/WebViewConnection.html#/s:6Nimbu.abstract: Called by the ConnectionMessageHandler when JS in the webview invokes a function of a native extension..

Classes/WebViewBridge.html#/s:6Nimbus13W.name: evaluate(_:with:callback:)
Classes/WebViewBridge.html#/s:6Nimbus13W.abstract: Invokes a Promise-returning Javascript function and call the specified

Classes/WebViewBridge.html#/s:6Nimbus13W.name: evaluate(_:with:callback:)
Classes/WebViewBridge.html#/s:6Nimbus13W.abstract: Overloaded version of evaluate that is used to call a Javascript function that doesn’t have a return value.

Classes/JSValueEncoder.html#/s:6Nimbus14.name: encode(_:context:)
Classes/JSValueEncoder.html#/s:6Nimbus14.abstract: Attempt to encode the given object to a JSValue.

Classes/JSValueDecoder.html#/s:6Nimbus14.name: decode(_:from:)
Classes/JSValueDecoder.html#/s:6Nimbus14.abstract: Attempt to decode the value to an instace of the given type.

Classes/EventPublisher.html#/s:6Nimbus14.abstract: Adds a listener for the given event name. This function is bound

Classes/EventPublisher.html#/s:6Nimbus14.name: removeListener(listenerId:)
Classes/EventPublisher.html#/s:6Nimbus14.abstract: Removes the given listener so it won’t receive future events.

Classes/EventPublisher.html#/s:6Nimbus14.name: publishEvent(_:payload:)
Classes/EventPublisher.html#/s:6Nimbus14.abstract: Publishes the given event with the given payload.

Classes/EventPublisher.html#/s:6Nimbus14.name: bind(to:)
Classes/EventPublisher.html#/s:6Nimbus14.abstract: Call this method from your plugins bind method.

Classes/EventPublisher.html.name: EventPublisher
Classes/EventPublisher.html.abstract: A mix-in class to add event publishing capabilities to a plugin.

Classes/JSContextBridge.html.name: JSContextBridge
Classes/JSContextBridge.html.abstract: A JSContextBridge links native functions to a JSContext instance.

Classes/JSValueDecoder.html.name: JSValueDecoder
Classes/JSValueDecoder.html.abstract: A Decoder class for converting from JSValue to a Decodable type.

Classes/JSValueEncoder.html.name: JSValueEncoder
Classes/JSValueEncoder.html.abstract: An Encoder class for encoding Encodable types to JSValue instances.

Classes/WebViewBridge.html.name: WebViewBridge
Classes/WebViewBridge.html.abstract: A WebViewBridge links native functions to a WKWebView instance.

Classes/WebViewConnection.html.name: WebViewConnection
Classes/WebViewConnection.html.abstract: A WebViewConnection links a web view to native functions.

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
